Summary: OVAL 3TEARS RED YELLOW BLUE OVER 60 FRWY LA 7TH AVE OFFRAMP
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Hacienda Heights
There were no other sightings in Hacienda Heights on or around October 30th 2008
divs: Sighting Details60 FREEWAY 5:00PM FRIDAY EVENING.HOVERED OVER HAC. HEIGHTS DUMP SIGHT. HOVERED FOR ABOUT 30 SEC OR SO MADE A FAST RIGHT AND DISSAPPEARED. HAD 3 TEARS OVAL COULD SEE INSIDE THE CRAFT BUT SAW NO ONE. NOT ONE PERSON REPORTED SIGHTING THAT DAY. PUMPER TO PUMPER TRAFFIC. RED YELLOW BLUE LIGHTING. WENT STRAIGHT TO THE PACIFIC OCEAN ABOUT 30 MILES AWAY,WHERE HUNDREDS OF SIGHTINGS HAVE BEEN SEEN AROUND LONG BEACH HARBOR TOWARDS CATALINA ISLAND. SIGHTING END OF OCT 2008 TAKING A WALK AS ALWAYS. JUST HAPPENED TO LOOK UP. THOUGHT A UFO WHEN FIRST SIGHTED. LIGHTS GOINGS ON AND OFF WHILE HOVERING OVER DUMP SIGHT. I COULD NOT BELIEVE WHAT WE WERE SEEING. A GREAT SIGHT VERY EXCITED. DID NOT SLEEP ALL NIGHT. THE CRAFT JUST TURNED RIGHT AND FLED AWAY.
